Helvetica or a close variant:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724115458im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HelveticaSelected_4506.jpg)
  
 [Helvetica & variants](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724115458/http:/www.identifont.com/list?3+Helvetica+0+MR+1+2GRR+1+2DUQ+1+FRF+1+FRB+1+N10+1+64M+1+MV+1+QC+1+27Q+1+3ZH+1+1MF+2+2IQD+2+22ZE+2+HCU+2+2OL+2+ETW+2+DBU+2+2RR1+2+2A07+2+2AA4+2+24PD+2+47K+2+3Z7+2+FU+2+FY+2+5Q5+2+2ZCX+2+2TA+2+4B7+2/).  
Don
Helvetica is close but I don't think that's it. Can't be 100% positive but looks like [Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724115458/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers) Condensed Bold.
